title: My League of legends is lagging
body: Even though my FPS is 500+ and my ping is 70ms, im always lagging on my computer and i don't know why? Tried playing other games on my computer and they are not lagging, unlike the lol. Please fix the server because it is lagging massively or maybe my Network is kinda bad. HELP PLEASE!!!!

replies.body:
Could you do the following for me,

* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the direct url to your ICSI netalyzr results.
